title: Highest Current Account Balance
description: In 2023, Kuwait had the highest current account balance in the world, amounting to 31.40% of its GDP.

title: Lowest Secondary Income Receipts
description: Kuwait recorded the lowest secondary income receipts in 2023, with a value of just 6,014,905 USD.

title: Highest Water Stress Level
description: In 2021, Kuwait experienced the highest level of water stress, with freshwater withdrawal at 3850.5% of available resources.

title: Full Internet Usage Among Females
description: As of 2023, 100% of the female population in Kuwait used the Internet, marking the highest rate globally.

title: Lowest Taxes Less Subsidies on Products
description: In 2023, Kuwait had the lowest taxes less subsidies on products, with a negative value of -10,669,658,015 USD.

title: Lowest Vulnerable Employment for Females
description: Kuwait had the lowest rate of vulnerable employment among females in 2023, at just 0.02% of female employment.

title: Lowest Population of Young Adult Males
description: In 2023, only 4.20% of Kuwait's male population was aged 20-24, the lowest percentage globally.
